links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..60
mathematica: RecurrenceTable[{a[0]==0, a[1]==1, a[n]==a[n-1]+a[n-2]*12^(n-2)},  a, {n, 60}] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 09 2012 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [0] cat[n le 2 select 1 else Self(n-1) + Self(n-2)*(12^(n-2)): n in [1..15]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 09 2012
